profileAlternative.name: LINGHUI Z.
profileAlternative.headline: Data Scientist at PCH
profileAlternative.summary:
I am good at data analysis, data mining, quantitative analysis, data modeling, predictive analysis, machine learning, business issues gathering and recognition. I have excellent problem-solving skills and programming skills, such as Python, R, and SQL. I can work on big data on AWS and Azure environment and I also can work under different operating systems such as Windows/Linux/Unix and with different databases, such as Oracle/Postgres/MySQL.

I can produce business insights from mass internal and external data, and then create a meaningful and understandable visualization on top of those insights.

educations.title: Harrisburg University of Science and Technology

given.text: Linghui(Karina) was amazing to work with at HAVI. She required little direction and would always deliver above expectations. Her analytical skills, coding skills, and problem solving skills meant she was the go to member on my team when we had a hard problem to solve. She could find flaws in the methodology and code that other members could not. Her hard work, friendly personality, and dependability made Linghui a joy to work with. She would be an incredible asset on any data science or analytics team. See less

I'd been classmate with Linghui for more than one year for masters's degree majored in Business Statistics. Linghui is very talented in data analysis area. She is equipped with strong Python and R language when we built solutions for our academic projects. Besides, she is a very good organizer when we worked together on these projects. She could always quickly have the blue print for how we were going to achieve the goals based on her solid statistic knowledge. I would recommend her without any hesitation due to her brilliant knowledge base and technical skills when we cooperated in RPI. See less

received.text:
While studying with Manyun in RPI, I feel she is an energetic and enthusiastic person. Work with her, we can quickly make a plan for our data mining course project in early staging and easily implement this plan within a few days from data engineering to modeling with MatLab. I am impressed by her efficient execution. She is good at documenting and visualization reporting as well. I really recommend her in any data analysis/ data visualization related positions.

profile.name: LINGHUI Z.
profile.headline: Data Scientist at PCH
profile.summary:
I am good at data analysis, data mining, quantitative analysis, data modeling, predictive analysis, machine learning, business issues gathering and recognition. I have excellent problem-solving skills and programming skills, such as Python, R, and SQL. I can work on big data on AWS and Azure environment and I also can work under different operating systems such as Windows/Linux/Unix and with different databases, such as Oracle/Postgres/MySQL.

I can produce business insights from mass internal and external data, and then create a meaningful and understandable visualization on top of those insights.
